CustomField.description: Billable forecasted hours multiplied by Assignment's bill rate (current week forward). Except for Customer Success projects where this is the sum of Milestone Amounts with Target Date in the future.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Billable forecasted hours multiplied by Assignment's bill rate (current week forward). Except for Customer Success projects where this is the sum of Milestone Amounts with Target Date in the future.
CustomField.label: ETC Billable ($)
